entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
